name: Car Push Engine Start Button Kit, Upgrade Push to Start Ignition Kit, Smart Keyless Go System for Most DC12V Cars
short_description: 【​​​​​​​Intelligent One-Touch Start】: The automotive one-touch start system requires only a single press and the engine responds instantly, eliminating the need to insert the key and turn it, saving time and effort and making every trip smoother and faster.

【Safe and Reliable】: The combination of the car one-touch start system and the car hidden lock system ensures that only authorized users can start the vehicle, effectively reducing the risk of illegal intrusion and vehicle theft.

【Installation】: Automotive circuits are complex and come with installation instructions, and to ensure the stable operation of the one-touch start system, the car one-touch start system needs to be installed by a professional car immobilizer installer. Note: Need to unlock/release/remove the steering lock in your vehicle.

【Engine Lock】: The car dark lock system can effectively protect your car security when the car is parked for 50 seconds, the system will automatically lock the engine while disarming is also very convenient, you just need to approach the key to the detection ring of about 5 centimeters, the system will be automatically disarmed. It is important to note that the one-touch start button system remotely cannot start, lock, and unlock the engine.

【Application】: The one-touch start and engine deadbolt system is compatible with most 12V vehicles, whether they are sedans, SUVs, or MPVs, it can be easily installed and used to meet the needs of different vehicle owners.
product_description: The one-touch start system makes it easier and more convenient to start your car. The engine locking function of car dark lock provides tighter anti-theft protection for your vehicle through intelligent identification and automatic locking function. Specification: Brand: BDZMC Name: Car Push Engine Start Button Kit Color: Black Material: Plastic+Metal Size: 3.49 x 3.49 x 1.15 inches Applicable: Most Vehicle Features: -The car one-touch start system allows you to easily start your car without the need for a key, realizing one-touch start and shut-off operation. -car locking system allows you to keep your vehicle safe even when it is unattended. -It is compact in design and can be carried around without taking up much space.

name: Start-X Remote Starter Kit for Chevy Silverado & GMC Sierra (2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013) Trucks | Key Ignition | Plug & Play Install | Lock 3X to Remote Start | Zero Wire Splicing
short_description: 𝗗𝗜𝗬 𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁 𝗸𝗶𝘁: Add remote start functionality to your vehicle for a fraction of the cost. Enjoy a comfortable driving experience from the start by pre-heating and defrosting your windshield in the winter or cooling down your vehicle before entering in the summer.
𝗩𝗲𝗵𝗶𝗰𝗹𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆: Chevy Silverado and GMC Sierra (2007 non-Classic, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013) trucks equipped with key blade ignition. Not compatible with 2007 Classic models.

𝗩𝗲𝗵𝗶𝗰𝗹𝗲 𝗿𝗲𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀: This kit is designed for key ignition vehicles only. Not compatible with push-to-start engine vehicles. Gas and automatic transmission only. Factory remote required. Some vehicle disassembly may be required; see installation guide for details. As a safety precaution, vehicle will shut down when door is opened; vehicle must be restarted before driving.

𝗨𝘀𝗲 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗳𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗼𝗿𝘆 𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲: Start your vehicle by pressing lock 3X on your existing OEM key fob. Press lock 3X again to turn off vehicle. Factory remote required – no remote is included in this kit. The distance you can remote start from is the same distance you can lock/unlock your vehicle.

𝗣𝗹𝘂𝗴 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗽𝗹𝗮𝘆 𝗶𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗹𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Included vehicle-specific T-harness eliminates wire cutting and splicing for fast, easy install. Installation video provides clear step-by-step instructions. Module is pre-flashed for your vehicle’s firmware to ensure seamless integration. Technical and customer support team available for additional help.

name: BANVIE ① Car Keyless Entry Security Alarm System + ② Remote Engine Starter + ③ Push to Start Stop Iginition Button
short_description: Remote control door lock/unklock/trunk release
Keyless go smart engine start stop push button.
remote engine start stop(only in arm status and hand brake pulled up),warm car for 15min)
Shock sensor alarm, side door alarm, ACC detecting alarm, siren signal output optional('+' for extra siren,"-" for car siren horn))
Auto central lock after driving, auto closing window(if window closer was installed) after arming
product_description: Main feature: 1. Arm/lock 2. Disarm/unlock 3. Panic code/Car finding 4. Push button start/stop 5. Remote engine start/stop 6. Remote trunk release 7. Illegal door opening /ACC triggered 8. Central door locking automation 9. Alarm if any shock 10. Emergency override 11. 15 minutes automatically engine cut off once the car is remote started if user does not step on foot brake pedal. 12. Keep pressing the button to start/stop the car 13. Closing window(if window closer was installed) 14. Code learning Please note: 1.It is highly recommended to install this product by a professional technician. 2. If your car with chip keys, a immobilizer bypass module(Asin: B075TH5B91) will be required to bypass the engine lock to come with the function of remote engine start, Bypass module not included, sold separately . 3. There is a method on page 7 of [User manual] for installer to bypass the chip if without a bypass module in your hand. Specifications: main unit system: Working Voltage: DC 12 V ± 3 V Static Current: ≤ 15mA PKE emission current: 40mA Working Frequency: 433 - 434 MHZ ACC / start current: 30A Remote control: Working Voltage: DC 3V Operation Current: 8uA Static Current: ≤ 15mA PKE emission current: 40mA Battery: CR2032 This product need to be connectted your car's original horn(output is "-"), if need the same product with siren, please search the Asin: B07L3QSK6W (output is '+') (siren output is +)
